name: A24
description: Independent entertainment company known for Moonlight, Everything Everywhere All at Once

name: Studio Ghibli
description: Japanese animation studio known for Spirited Away, My Neighbor Totoro

name: Pixar
description: Animation studio known for Toy Story, Up, and Inside Out

name: Neon
description: American film production and distribution company known for Parasite, Portrait of a Lady on Fire

name: Blumhouse
description: Production company known for Get Out, The Invisible Man, and The Purge

name: Warner Bros.
description: Major film studio known for Harry Potter, The Dark Knight, and The Matrix

name: Universal Pictures
description: Major film studio known for Jurassic Park, Fast & Furious, and E.T.

name: Annapurna Pictures
description: Production company known for Her, Zero Dark Thirty, and Phantom Thread

name: Focus Features
description: Specialty film company known for Lost in Translation, Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind

name: Lionsgate
description: Entertainment company known for The Hunger Games, John Wick, and La La Land

name: Miramax
description: Film and television studio known for Pulp Fiction, Good Will Hunting, and Chicago

name: Laika
description: Stop-motion animation studio known for Coraline, ParaNorman, and Kubo and the Two Strings
